translations: n.（作家或艺术家的）全部作品，作品全集（oeuvre 的复数）

phrs.translation: 着作集, 作品, 笛卡尔着作
如诗如梦钢琴曲, 如诗如梦钢琴曲专辑

sentences.sentence: The hors d"oeuvres were so tasty I filled up on them and didn"t eat any dinner when I got home.
sentences.translation: 他们的点心真好吃，我吃了好多，回到家连晚饭都没吃。

sentences.sentence: The theoretical bases of creating electronic oeuvres are constructive learning and quality education.
sentences.translation: 其重要理论依据是建构主义学习理论和素质教育理论。

sentences.sentence: His penchant for modern design craftsmanship, commercial art and Manga aesthetics prevails throughout his oeuvres and articulate a uniquely Japanese perspective on Contemporary visual culture.
sentences.translation: 他毕生的作品都流露他对现代设计工艺，商业艺术和漫画美学的喜爱，很能代表日本画家对当代视觉文化的独特观点。
